name: Talking Tiger Big Cat
description:
Just talk to the Talking Tiger Big Cat. The cute tiger answers with his funny voice and reacts to what you say or your touch. With a lot of exciting games with many levels to play!

If you like talking animal games like talking cat or animal games in general then you will love Talking Tiger Big Cat!

★★★ Features: ★★★
✔ High quality 3D graphics
✔ Talking animal: talking tiger big cat
✔ Tiger game - tiger games
✔ The tiger repeats everything you say with a funny voice
✔ Fun for the whole family

Talking Tiger Big Cat is a free application. Download Talking Tiger Big Cat now and please rate it with 5 stars if you like it.
